races.analysis_summary: Turbo Torque brings superior South East Queensland form (Doomben/Sunshine Coast) to this provincial maiden. Kendrick stable is elite. Mississippi Dream is the consistent danger.

selections.name: Turbo Torque
selections.reason: Drops significantly in class from Doomben/Sunshine Coast runs. Drawn perfectly.

selections.name: Mississippi Dream
selections.reason: Consistent placer, good 2nd at Townsville last start. Solid threat.

selections.name: Heroic Talent
selections.reason: Placed 2 of last 3, including a 2nd at this track. Honest.

selections.name: Red Envelope
selections.reason: Fair 4th here last start, can add value to exotics.

danger_horse.name: Mississippi Dream
danger_horse.reason: Consistent form and handles the soft going well.

races.analysis_summary: Paciera looks the winner on paper with strong Sunshine Coast form for the Currie yard. Precise Torque adds interest from the Kendrick stable.

selections.name: Paciera
selections.reason: Coming off a 2nd at Sunshine Coast. That form is superior to this field.

selections.name: Precise Torque
selections.reason: Kendrick runner dropping in class. Expect sharp improvement.

selections.name: Girls Got Attitude
selections.reason: Nice 2nd at Townsville last start. Draws the rail.

selections.name: Kenny Koala
selections.reason: Debutant with a 2nd in a recent trial. Watch betting.

danger_horse.name: Precise Torque
danger_horse.reason: Stable has a high strike rate when bringing horses north.

races.analysis_summary: King Spirit brings the strongest form lines but carries weight. Presocratics loves this track. Competitive sprint.

selections.name: King Spirit
selections.reason: Ran 5th in a BM70 at Sunshine Coast. Drops to local BM72. Class runner.

selections.name: Presocratics
selections.reason: Won well here last start. Track specialist (2 for 2).

selections.name: Kai Mondo
selections.reason: Consistent type, rarely far away. Good 2nd last start.

selections.name: Captain Fox
selections.reason: Veteran who can pop up for a place.

danger_horse.name: Presocratics
danger_horse.reason: Undefeated at this track and in winning form.

races.analysis_summary: Better Go Torque resumes for Kendrick and should be ready. Anthropology is the local danger from the Taylor yard.

selections.name: Better Go Torque
selections.reason: Resuming for top stable. Trialled well enough and has metro experience.

selections.name: Anthropology
selections.reason: Clinton Taylor stable is lethal here. 2nd at Emerald was good.

selections.name: Villandry
selections.reason: Resuming. Sunshine Coast form is decent for this grade.

selections.name: Ready Marea
selections.reason: 2yo on debut. Won a trial here recently. Respect.

danger_horse.name: Anthropology
danger_horse.reason: Local stable with high strike rate, will be competitive.

races.analysis_summary: Italian Dancer and Savvy Bee both won at Sunshine Coast last start. They look a cut above the locals here.

selections.name: Italian Dancer
selections.reason: Won at Sunshine Coast last start. Ideally placed to repeat.

selections.name: Savvy Bee
selections.reason: Also a last start Sunshine Coast winner. Drawn the rail. Huge threat.

selections.name: Kareem
selections.reason: Won here two back. Failed in metro grade last time. Can bounce back.

selections.name: Replace The Ace
selections.reason: Consistent local. 3rd here last start.

danger_horse.name: Savvy Bee
danger_horse.reason: In winning form and gets the run of the race from barrier 1.

races.analysis_summary: Field reduced by scratches. Logan Street Lion has massive class edge but carries weight. Obligated is in winning form.

selections.name: Logan Street Lion
selections.reason: Class runner ($326k earnings). Resuming but should be too good if fit.

selections.name: Obligated
selections.reason: Won well at Townsville. Hard fit and drawn the rail.

selections.name: Tizso Fab
selections.reason: Won here recently. Light weight is a big advantage.

selections.name: Stampe
selections.reason: Veteran who is always around the mark.

danger_horse.name: Obligated
danger_horse.reason: Race fit and in winning form, unlike the top pick.

races.analysis_summary: Rothecate resumes for the Currie yard and brings strong form lines. Ten Carat Lucy is a promising local resuming.

selections.name: Rothecate
selections.reason: Resuming. 2nd at Doomben last prep reads very well for this.

selections.name: Ten Carat Lucy
selections.reason: Won on debut then spelled. Trialled well. Promising.

selections.name: Rum Rumble
selections.reason: Consistent placegetter. 3rd here last start.

selections.name: Panigale
selections.reason: Fair 4th here last time. Drawn to get a soft run.

danger_horse.name: Ten Carat Lucy
danger_horse.reason: Unexposed potential and from a top local stable.

races.analysis_summary: Heart And Spirit brings superior Sunshine Coast form and looks the one to beat. Flying Animo is the fresh danger.

selections.name: Heart And Spirit
selections.reason: 3rd at Sunshine Coast last start. That form is dominant here. Best Bet.

selections.name: Flying Animo
selections.reason: Resuming for Ricky Vale. Usually fires fresh.

selections.name: Melo Melo Kava
selections.reason: Consistent local. 2nd here last start.

selections.name: Upstart Legend
selections.reason: 3rd here last start. Honest type.

danger_horse.name: Flying Animo
danger_horse.reason: Trainer has excellent strike rate with fresh horses.

exotic_strategy.strategy: Win Bet #1 (Best Bet of the Day); Exacta 1 / 6,7
